description: The patient was compound heterozygous for silent mutations in the butyrylcholinesterase gene. The response to mivacurium was an extensively prolonged duration of action.
num_tested_probands: The patient and his family members had blood samples drawn to determine BChE activity, phenotype, and genotype.

Found in the text: '18. Primo-Parmo SL, Bartels CF, Lightstone H, van der Spek AFL, La Du BN: Heterogeneity of the silent phenotype of human butyrylcholinesterase: Identification of eight new mutations...'
num_positive_het_probands: None of the probands were heterozygous for a pathogenic variant.
positive_phenotypes: Found in the text: 'Silent phenotype' and 'Abnormal plasma cholinesterase activity'
num_compound_or_double_hets: The patient was compound heterozygous for two silent mutations.
text: The patient was compound heterozygous for silent mutations in the BCHE gene.
